articles.title: Explosions, leaks and fires: Eskom's technical woes that escalated load shedding to Stage 4 - news24.com
articles.description: Breakdowns at Eskom power stations earlier this month meant extensive load shedding for the country when it coincided with high levels of planned maintenance. Diesel shortages, an explosion, and a fire pushed SA to Stage 4.
